attributes.action: increase police pay by at least 5% every year for the next 5 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is about time that serving front line police officers were paid in line with the everyday dangers they face in what is a very demanding job. The current pay offer is an insult to hard working police officers who risk there lifes on a daily basis ensuring public safety. Should the current offer be approved i am in no doubt that a number of experienced officers will leave the job for one with less paperwork, less stress and more money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
